name: Kabitis 2: Fire Sword
description:
Top Mountain City is being attacked by an army of Pedabots under the command of Billy. Take on the role of Kabitis and wield the Fire Sword to save Top Mountain City.

During the mission, Kabitis will explore different areas with various stages. The game retains the 2D platform style, but with new mechanics compared to the previous title.

Run, somersault and bolt blows.
Learn the techniques as you progress through the game.
Collect items by defeating enemies.
Save your progress to continue when you want.
